title: [EUW] Unable to log in, have followed all troubleshooting tips on fixing this issue.
body:
Hi, about 2 hour ago I was playing league and having a blast. I restarted my client and now I am unable to log in.

As i attempt to log in the client is stuck on authenticating. Before this I can see that there is a login queue. I have followed all recommendations following this link, including using the hextech repair tool. Restarted my router/computer, changed DNS settings, resyncing system time, you name it. 

I have ComHem (a swedish isp) if that is any usefull information.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

replies.body: Same, but riot is awave of this problem and are trying to fix it, well atleast they say so.
The store problem? or am i missing an anouncment

No, but this not only post regarding this problem, theres atleast 8 and 6 of them had riotter responce that asured us they're aware of our problem and are looking into it. They just haven't announced it yet officialy.

We were having some problems with the EU login servers earlier today, but we were able to get those smoothed out relatively quickly once we noticed the reports from you all! You should be able to get back on the Rift, but hit us back if you still can't!
Also my friend can see that my account logs in when i try to, but i never get logged in on my end.
Can't say I've done all the steps, but im also having this problem.
